faqList.name: What is Stability’s business model?
content: Stability is an open-source software developer, commercializing its blockchain node software through licensing to enterprise and high-volume consumers. Without a native token or token sale model, Stability instead licenses its node software to generate annual recurring revenue (ARR) - offering a unique model in the industry.

This Software-as-a-Service model contrasts with every public blockchain today by enabling every day consumers to use a public blockchain at no cost, while improving upon the benefits of blockchain technology as an enterprise business solution.

faqList.content: While private blockchains impose limitations on user access and permissions, Stability stands out as a public, tokenless and permissionless platform, enabling open interaction and collaboration across the Stability network for anyone who wishes to participate.

content: Stability stands out as the pioneer in genuine permissionless public blockchains, setting itself apart from the industry norm of requiring a cryptocurrency to access the network.
Furthermore, Stability distinguishes itself by being the sole public blockchain network to provide non-financial on-chain transactions.

Lastly, as a currency-agnostic network, Stability is unaffected by the typical regulatory uncertainties, scalability constraints, volatility, and user experience challenges that severely limited adoption of today’s public blockchains.

faqList.name: What is a non-financial transaction on Stability and why is it important for the blockchain industry?
content: Unlike public blockchains that require cryptocurrency for transactions, making every on-chain interaction financial, Stability operates without a cryptocurrency, thus removing the need to acquire or exchange a financial asset in order to interact on the network

By enabling zero fee, non-financial on-chain interactions, Stability unlocks unlimited utility and eliminates the key obstacles preventing global adoption of blockchain technology, making it accessible to everyone.

resourcesList.title: Introducing STABILITY
resourcesList.text: Digital innovation has enabled fast, autonomous global interaction unlike any prior period in history. As more aspects of our modern life are transposed to the digital space, the need for tamper-proof record keeping, security, and data privacy is rising exponentially. Blockchain offers a great solution.
